original_text: And if so be that the king's wrath arise, and he say unto thee, Wherefore approached ye so nigh unto the city when ye did fight? knew ye not that they would shoot from the wall?
korean_text: 혹시 왕이 노하여 네게 말씀하기를 너희가 어찌하여 성에 그처럼 가까이 가서 싸웠느냐 그들이 성 위에서 쏠 줄을 알지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And if so be that the king's wrath arise
Wherefore approached ye so nigh unto the city
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어찌하여 그 성에 그리 가까이 나아갔느냐

sentences.original_text: that they would shoot from the wall?
